name: RandoMaZer - ATARI ST/STe/Falcon
description:
Guide your marbles to the target. Avoid the obstacles and collect the goodies – it is as simple as that, if it weren’t that complicated.

What is random in RANDOMAZER?

Well… the mazes… While a level has a certain topic or task to master, the way to success is different every time you start the level. In some levels your marbles have to be guided indirectly using signposts. In other levels you control a marble directly - sometimes even against deadly enemy marbles.

Get your STe blitter into gear with nicely scrolling isometric graphics by Sébastien Larnac "STS" and brand new YM Tunes by xFalcon.

There are 60 Levels for hours of marble-rolling crazyness!

Important! it is worth reading the instructions on the homepage: How to play

Game Credits: Credits

Boxed Version published by Bitmapsoft https://www.bitmapsoft.co.uk/
